languages.text: "Эхо варпа. Энергии Имматериума, просочившиеся в реальность и принявшие форму вокс-сигнала. Я обнаружил в архиве задокументированные случаи порчи, протекавшей сходным образом. Слушать пустоту — опасное ремесло".

"An echo of the warp. Energies of the Immaterium that had seeped into realspace and taken the shape of a vox-signal. I have found recorded cases of similarly induced corruption in the archive. Listening to the void is a perilous occupation."
languages.original_text: "Эхо варпа. Энергии Имматериума, просочившиеся в реальность и принявшие форму вокс-сигнала. Я обнаружил в архиве задокументированные случаи порчи, протекавшей сходным образом. Слушать пустоту — опасное ремесло".

traits.locale_text: "An echo of the warp. Energies of the Immaterium that had seeped into reality and taken the shape of a vox-signal. I have found recorded cases of similarly induced corruption in the archive. Listening to the void is a perilous occupation."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “是亚空间的回声。那些来自亚空间的能量渗入了真实世界，以音阵信号的形式出现。我在档案库中查到了音阵信号诱发腐化的类似案例。聆听虚空之声这一职责充满危险。”
languages.original_text: "An echo of the warp. Energies of the Immaterium that had seeped into realspace and taken the shape of a vox-signal. I have found recorded cases of similarly induced corruption in the archive. Listening to the void is a perilous occupation."

traits.locale_text: “是亚空间的回声。那些来自亚空间的能量渗入了真实世界，以音阵信号的形式出现。我在档案库中查到了音阵信号诱发腐化的类似案例。聆听虚空之声这一职责充满危险。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Un eco de disformidad. Las energías del Inmaterio han entrado en el espacio real en forma de señal de voco. He encontrado casos documentados de corrupción idéntica en los archivos. Escuchar el vacío es una ocupación peligrosa».
languages.original_text: "An echo of the warp. Energies of the Immaterium that had seeped into realspace and taken the shape of a vox-signal. I have found recorded cases of similarly induced corruption in the archive. Listening to the void is a perilous occupation."

traits.locale_text: «Un eco de disformidad. Las energías del Inmaterio han entrado en el espacio real en forma de señal de voco. He encontrado casos documentados de corrupción idéntica en los archivos. Escuchar el vacío es una ocupación peligrosa».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「歪みの残響だ。非物質世界のエネルギーがリアルスペースに浸透し、ヴォクス信号の形になったものだ。アーカイブには同様の事例が記録されている。虚空に耳を傾けることは危険な仕事なのだ」
languages.original_text: "An echo of the warp. Energies of the Immaterium that had seeped into realspace and taken the shape of a vox-signal. I have found recorded cases of similarly induced corruption in the archive. Listening to the void is a perilous occupation."

traits.locale_text: 「歪みの残響だ。非物質世界のエネルギーがリアルスペースに浸透し、ヴォクス信号の形になったものだ。アーカイブには同様の事例が記録されている。虚空に耳を傾けることは危険な仕事なのだ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Ein Echo des Warps. Energien des Immateriums, die in den Realraum gesickert waren und die Gestalt eines Voxsignals angenommen haben. Ich habe im Archiv belegte Fälle entdeckt, in denen Verderbtheit auf ähnliche Art induziert wurde. Der Leere zu lauschen, ist ein gefährlicher Beruf."
languages.original_text: "An echo of the warp. Energies of the Immaterium that had seeped into realspace and taken the shape of a vox-signal. I have found recorded cases of similarly induced corruption in the archive. Listening to the void is a perilous occupation."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Echo des Warps. Energien des Immateriums, die in den Realraum gesickert waren und die Gestalt eines Voxsignals angenommen haben. Ich habe im Archiv belegte Fälle entdeckt, in denen Verderbtheit auf ähnliche Art induziert wurde. Der Leere zu lauschen, ist ein gefährlicher Beruf."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Un écho du Warp, des énergies de l'Immaterium qui s'étaient infiltrées dans l'espace réel et avaient pris la forme d'un signal-vox. J'ai trouvé des cas similaires de corruption dans les archives. Écouter le vide est une activité dangereuse. »
languages.original_text: "An echo of the warp. Energies of the Immaterium that had seeped into realspace and taken the shape of a vox-signal. I have found recorded cases of similarly induced corruption in the archive. Listening to the void is a perilous occupation."

traits.locale_text: « Un écho du Warp, des énergies de l'Immaterium qui s'étaient infiltrées dans l'espace réel et avaient pris la forme d'un signal-vox. J'ai trouvé des cas similaires de corruption dans les archives. Écouter le vide est une activité dangereuse. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "An echo of the warp. Energies of the Immaterium that had seeped into realspace and taken the shape of a vox-signal. I have found recorded cases of similarly induced corruption in the archive. Listening to the void is a perilous occupation."

languages.text: "Bir öteboyut yankısı. Gerçekuzaya sızmış, voks sinyali şeklindeki Tindiyar enerjileri. Arşivde, yozlaşmanın benzer şekilde vuku bulduğu başka örneklere denk geldim. Uçsuzu dinlemek, çok riskli bir faaliyettir."
languages.original_text: "An echo of the warp. Energies of the Immaterium that had seeped into realspace and taken the shape of a vox-signal. I have found recorded cases of similarly induced corruption in the archive. Listening to the void is a perilous occupation."

traits.locale_text: "Bir öteboyut yankısı. Gerçekuzaya sızan ve bir voks sinyali şeklini alan Tindiyar enerjileri. Arşivde, yozlaşmanın benzer şekilde vuku bulduğu başka örneklere denk geldim. Uçsuzu dinlemek çok riskli bir faaliyettir."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
